subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Perhaps related to {{och-l|虐|to oppress, to coerce, to be violent}}.

Compare {{cog|th|งก ๆ||shivering, shaking (due to fever or fear)}}, {{cog|th|หงก ๆ||shivering (as from ague)}}.
